languages.text: "Неумирающий назвал имя Домин'Теодоры. Он всего лишь выбрал тебя, чтобы исполнить Его волю. Прочее неважно".
"The Undying One called Domin'Theodora's name. He merely chose you to carry out His will. Nothing else matters."
languages.original_text: "Неумирающий назвал имя Домин'Теодоры. Он всего лишь выбрал тебя, чтобы исполнить Его волю. Прочее неважно".

traits.locale_text: "The Undying One called Domin'Theodora's name. He merely chose you to carry out His will. Nothing else matters."
"The Undying One called Domin'Theodora's name. He merely chose you to carry out His will. Nothing else matters."
"The Undying One called Domin'Theodora's name. He merely chose you to carry out His will. Nothing else matters."
"The Undying One called Domin'Theodora's name. He merely chose you to carry out His will. Nothing else matters."
"The Undying One called Domin'Theodora's name. He merely chose you to carry out His will. Nothing else matters."

languages.text: "Der Todlose hat Domin'Theodoras Namen genannt. Er hat Euch lediglich ausgewählt, seinen Willen auszuführen. Nur das zählt."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One called Domin'Theodora's name. He merely chose you to carry out His will. Nothing else matters."

traits.locale_text: "Der Todlose hat Domin'Theodoras Namen genannt. Er hat Euch lediglich ausgewählt, seinen Willen auszuführen. Nur das zählt."

languages.text: « L'Immortel a prononcé le nom de Domin'Théodora. Vous n'étiez guère que l'instrument de Sa volonté, et c'est tout ce qui compte à mes yeux. »
languages.original_text: "The Undying One called Domin'Theodora's name. He merely chose you to carry out His will. Nothing else matters."

traits.locale_text: « L'Immortel a prononcé le nom de Domin'Théodora. Vous n'étiez guère que l'instrument de Sa volonté, et c'est tout ce qui compte à mes yeux. »

languages.text: «El Inmortal pronunció el nombre de Domin'Theodora. Usted fue el instrumento de Su voluntad. Lo demás es irrelevante».
languages.original_text: "The Undying One called Domin'Theodora's name. He merely chose you to carry out His will. Nothing else matters."

traits.locale_text: «El Inmortal pronunció el nombre de Domin'Theodora. Usted fue el instrumento de Su voluntad. Lo demás es irrelevante».

languages.text: 「不死の者はドミン・シオドーラの名前を呼んだ。主はただ、主の意志を遂行するためにあなたを選んだ。それ以外のことは重要ではないわ」
languages.original_text: "The Undying One called Domin'Theodora's name. He merely chose you to carry out His will. Nothing else matters."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者はドミン・シオドーラの名前を呼んだ。主はただ、主の意志を遂行するためにあなたを選んだ。それ以外のことは重要ではないわ」

languages.text: “因为不死之神呼唤了秘者西奥多拉的名字，祂仅仅是选择了你来执行祂的旨意。除此之外，一切都不重要。”
languages.original_text: "The Undying One called Domin'Theodora's name. He merely chose you to carry out His will. Nothing else matters."

traits.locale_text: “因为不死之神呼唤了秘者西奥多拉的名字，祂仅仅是选择了你来执行祂的旨意。除此之外，一切都不重要。”

languages.original_text: "The Undying One called Domin'Theodora's name. He merely chose you to carry out His will. Nothing else matters."

languages.text: "Ölmeyen, Domin'Theodora'nın adını söyledi. Seni yalnızca arzusunu yerine getirmen için seçti. Başka bir şeyin önemi yok."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One called Domin'Theodora's name. He merely chose you to carry out His will. Nothing else matters."
